Drink!\""},{"lineNumber":82410,"originalJapaneseLine":"「聞き覚えのある会話をしおって……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I hear familiar conversations...\""},{"lineNumber":82411,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お前ら、随分と朝が早いな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You guys sure are up early.\""},{"lineNumber":82412,"originalJapaneseLine":"「朝ぁ……？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Morning...?\""},{"lineNumber":82413,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、もうそんな時間だったのか」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, is it that time already?\""},{"lineNumber":82414,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……は？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Huh?\""},{"lineNumber":82415,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あっ、お前ら昨日から飲み通しか！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, you guys have been drinking nonstop since yesterday!\""},{"lineNumber":82416,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はっはっはっ、そうに決まってんだろ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hahaha, of course that's the case.\""},{"lineNumber":82417,"originalJapaneseLine":"「駄目だなぁ、酒に弱くなってる気がするぜ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No good, I feel like I'm getting weaker with alcohol."},{"lineNumber":82418,"originalJapaneseLine":"　俺も年かねぇ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Maybe I'm getting old.\""},{"lineNumber":82419,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お酒の空瓶がひーふーみーよー……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Empty bottles of alcohol, one, two, three, four..."},{"lineNumber":82420,"originalJapaneseLine":"　沢山転がってます……」","translatedEnglishLine":"There are many scattered around...\""},{"lineNumber":82421,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ああ……まさか一晩中付き合わされるとは……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah... I never thought I’d be kept company all night..."},{"lineNumber":82422,"originalJapaneseLine":"　しかも、二人は強い酒をカパカパと","translatedEnglishLine":"Moreover, the two keep gulping down strong drinks"},{"lineNumber":82423,"originalJapaneseLine":"　水のように飲み続けるんだから……」","translatedEnglishLine":"like water...\""},{"lineNumber":82424,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ヘルマン人の肝臓は狂ってるな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Herman people's livers are crazy.\""},{"lineNumber":82425,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はあ……駄目な大人ですわ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Sigh... such hopeless adults...\""},{"lineNumber":82426,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、チルディ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, Tildi.\""},{"lineNumber":82427,"originalJapaneseLine":"「さーさーさー、酒盛りはそれくらいにして、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Alright, alright, enough drinking,"},{"lineNumber":82428,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そろそろお休みになって下さいまし！」","translatedEnglishLine":"please start getting some rest!\""},{"lineNumber":82429,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おいおい、なんで俺らが","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey, hey, why do we have to be told that?\""},{"lineNumber":82430,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そんなこと言われねぇといけねぇんだよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Why do we have to be told such a thing?\""},{"lineNumber":82431,"originalJapaneseLine":"「貴方がわたくしの師匠だからです！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Because you are my teacher!"},{"lineNumber":82432,"originalJapaneseLine":"　わたくしまで変な目で","translatedEnglishLine":"If you keep this up,"},{"lineNumber":82433,"originalJapaneseLine":"　見られるじゃありませんか！」","translatedEnglishLine":"I'll also be looked at strangely!\""},{"lineNumber":82434,"originalJapaneseLine":"「えー……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ehh...\""},{"lineNumber":82435,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いい大人が、えー、とか言わない！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"A grown-up shouldn't say 'ehh'!"},{"lineNumber":82436,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ほらほら、他の方が起きてくる前に早く！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Come on, hurry before others wake up!\""},{"lineNumber":82437,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"............\""},{"lineNumber":82438,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ほっとこ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Let's leave it be...\""},{"lineNumber":82439,"originalJapaneseLine":"朝、7時――","translatedEnglishLine":"Morning, 7 AM—"},{"lineNumber":82440,"originalJapaneseLine":"早朝ではあるが、まだ夜の明けぬ時間、","translatedEnglishLine":"Though early morning, it was still before dawn,"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「誰が爺さんだ」
「はふはふ、あちあち」
「うむ、やはり正月はお汁粉に限るな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm, after all, New Year's is best with sweet red bean soup.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 甘くて美味い」
起きてきたランスがお汁粉を食べながら
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance got up and was eating sweet red bean soup

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 城内を散歩していた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: while taking a walk inside the castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 廊下はまだほの暗く、人の姿もまばらだった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The corridor was still dim, with few people in sight.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うーむ、元旦の早朝独特の
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm, the unique early morning of New Year's Day

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この澄み切った身の引き締まるような空気……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This clear, refreshing air that tightens the body..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がははは、俺のように涼やかな男にはピッタリだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Gahaha, it's perfect for a cool man like me."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ピッタリ……かは、分からないですが」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Perfect... well, I’m not sure about that though."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「気持ちいいですねぇ、ランス様」
「うむ」
「む、こんな早朝でも、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm, even this early in the morning,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もう起きてる早起きがいるな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: there are already some early risers up."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おっ、ランスと嬢ちゃんじゃねぇか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh, isn't that Rance and the young lady?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おーっ、坊主！　お前も飲め！　飲め！」
「聞き覚えのある会話をしおって……」
「お前ら、随分と朝が早いな」
「あ、もうそんな時間だったのか」
「あっ、お前ら昨日から飲み通しか！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, you guys have been drinking nonstop since yesterday!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はっはっはっ、そうに決まってんだろ」
「駄目だなぁ、酒に弱くなってる気がするぜ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No good, I feel like I'm getting weaker with alcohol.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺も年かねぇ」
「お酒の空瓶がひーふーみーよー……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Empty bottles of alcohol, one, two, three, four...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 沢山転がってます……」
「ああ……まさか一晩中付き合わされるとは……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah... I never thought I’d be kept company all night...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかも、二人は強い酒をカパカパと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Moreover, the two keep gulping down strong drinks

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 水のように飲み続けるんだから……」
「ヘルマン人の肝臓は狂ってるな」
「はあ……駄目な大人ですわ……」
「あ、チルディ」
「さーさーさー、酒盛りはそれくらいにして、
そろそろお休みになって下さいまし！」
「おいおい、なんで俺らが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey, hey, why do we have to be told that?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんなこと言われねぇといけねぇんだよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Why do we have to be told such a thing?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「貴方がわたくしの師匠だからです！
わたくしまで変な目で
見られるじゃありませんか！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'll also be looked at strangely!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いい大人が、えー、とか言わない！
ほらほら、他の方が起きてくる前に早く！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Come on, hurry before others wake up!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ほっとこ……」
早朝ではあるが、まだ夜の明けぬ時間、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Though early morning, it was still before dawn,

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おっ、ランスと嬢ちゃんじゃねぇか」

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おーっ、坊主！　お前も飲め！　飲め！」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, you guys have been drinking nonstop since yesterday!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はっはっはっ、そうに決まってんだろ」
